thread.title: Horoscope for Saturday, 10/3/15 by Christopher Renstrom
thread.title_full: Horoscope for Saturday, 10/3/15 by Christopher Renstrom - SFGate

author: sfgate.com
title: Horoscope for Saturday, 10/3/15 by Christopher Renstrom
text:
ARIES. (March 20 - April 19): You're allowed an off day. You have to be free to make mistakes if you want to grow. How else do you learn?
TAURUS. (April 20 - May 20): Your idea of what people will buy is getting in the way of your creativity. Trust in your natural impulses. They're spot on.
GEMINI. (May 21 - June 20): A friend pulls you aside today for some quick coaching. Listen to her. She has a better ideal of what serves your best interests now.
CANCER. (June 21 - July 21): Consider taking a daylong vow of silence before a heated exchange leads you to give away a secret or a confidence.
LEO. (July 22 - Aug. 22): Don't be so quick to play peacekeeper. Sometimes the best way to establish harmony is to let people hash out their differences.
VIRGO. (Aug. 23 - Sept. 22): Are you sure you want to monkey around with the wording of an agreement? The terms that restrict you are also the same that protect you.
LIBRA. (Sept. 23 - Oct. 22): You see it as your duty to turn somebody around, but not everyone is a lost cause waiting to be found. Get to know this person first. You may learn something important.
SCORPIO. (Oct. 23 - Nov. 21): An acquaintance's cavalier attitude rubs you the wrong way, but it's only a fa√ßade. Underneath is someone who takes things just as seriously as you.
SAGITTARIUS. (Nov. 22 - Dec. 20): Forget about getting the last word in edgewise. If you really want to make a statement, then just agree. Your uncustomary acquiescence sends shockwaves.
CAPRICORN. (Dec. 21 - Jan. 19): You're ambitious, but you also play fair and square. It's this combination of smart and heart that gets a hesitant type to choose you today.
AQUARIUS. (Jan. 20 - Feb. 17): You see a lot of yourself in a spunky young colleague, but let him fight his own battles. After all it worked for you then it will work for him.
PISCES. (Feb. 18 - March 19): An uppity sibling or in-law who always has the answers comes up short today. Put past resentments aside and lend a hand. This could be a fresh
